description:
Today I bring you , "Attack of the Nerd(s)!
Alright, so it's probably not too nice to call your model that right off the bat, but in my defense, I am pretty sure Hal described himself in just that way.
Ok, so geeky guys are a lot cooler than in my day. They seem to be more well-rounded and savvy in many things that one might thing would be the domain of the uber suave. No protractor and pen in this guy's front pocket.
So I thought it would be cool to have a video with a board game playing and computer egghead type. Keep things real.
And goodness, these guys can cum buckets!
title: Hal - Solo
